website_summaries.verdict: Features plenty of options and features, but some complain it gives inconsistent results.
pros: Dual-use thermometer that lets you check temperature by ear reading or forehead scan
Backlit screen for checking temperatures in low-light environments
Fever alarm lets you know if thermometer registers a fever
cons: If you take the thermometer to a room with a temperature that's different from the first, it takes 30 minutes to adjust to get an accurate reading

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I'm a Professional Nurse with this one.
customer_reviews.text: My first forehead/ear thermometer and I am very pleased. I have just been using it a week so far, plan on keeping this one and get rid of all my tongue thermometers expect one for a backup. I do recommend keeping the instructions with the thermometer, reading and learning all the hints and trouble shooting tips. I love sneaking in on my kids sleeping to take their temp. I can also see using this with those elderly that may have trouble using a tongue thermometer. So far so good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only down fall is the head sensor gives a way diff reading than the ear, the ear is the most accurate reading. Arrived same day for an extra $5which was worth it with my son having flu and not able to go out to buy another one when our old one not reading correctly. Deff worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Mrsdez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use. The swipe across the forehead option is amazing! Very accurate and comes in a cool holding bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike estes

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the easy to use thermometer. The readings were very accurate. I love that it came with its own Satchel for storage and protection. I only deducted one star because I wish that it read room temperatures. For me this is very important especially with the infant. I would definitely recommend this product. As a matter of fact this is a gift for my cousin who has a baby on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Payne

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! It's the most accurate reading from any thermometer I've used. It also is so easy to use, just push a button, quick swipe on forehead and immediately you have an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R.

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent or accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions and left the thermometer in the same room as our toddler for well over 30 mins before attempting to read and the thermometer still has very erratic reading. Sometimes it shows what is well below a normal temperature and other times it shows temps well above normal. We cannot get consecutive temperature readings back to back from the ears or forehead. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: brandon  whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this thermometer, perfect size, perfect self explanatory instructions. No hard time getting a sick little ones temperature. Price is super accessible. I don’t think I’ll go back to any other thermometer. Measurements are accurate even after using it several times in different little ones. I am very very pleased with it. I am a mom of three little ones and this is one of those little things that make my life easier!
customer_reviews.author: J&ERosa

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thermometer I've ever used. Though it is easy to operate, the accuracy is terrible and isn't reliable as it consistently reads 97.6°. Would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermometer because I read the reviews and it looked good but after a few uses it stopped working so I would appreciate it if amazon can send me another one because it’s less than a year.This thermometer is not worth anybody’s money because it doesn’t work so don’t bother wasting your money i did ask for a replacement I never got even a reply I’m very disappointed with the way amazon handled this situation and I buy there a lot if you want to check my account it’s very unfair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Quick results and fantastic warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have a more complete medicine cabinet because I have a thermometer that is easy to use and will give me accurate results and quick results. I recommend signing up for the warranty right away, so that you can get it for 3 years, which is a great warranty for a little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: NHJ

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this! Within ten seconds I got various temperatures ranging from 101 back to 98.7! Unacceptable when you have a toddler. I read awesome reviews so this is a bummer. I am unsure how to contact the company to make this right. Perhaps I received a faulty thermometer?
customer_reviews.author: jennine

customer_reviews.title: 3.5-4 stars
customer_reviews.text: So far this thermometer seems accurate, but I'm finding it extremely difficult to get the cap back on after it has been taken off to check the in-ear temperature. That's pretty frustrating, hence the drop in stars.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate so far!  I just hope it doesn't break quickly than the last thermometer I bought.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's much more accurate than the other thermometer that this once replaced. As long as it lasts, I feel it will be a great product! My practice with it thus far is that the ear temp if more reliable, but I'm new to it and may take better readings with the head temp. in the future.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer works very well with babies and small kids. Just beware the thermometer needs to be in the same room as the person for 30 minutes after that it gives precise temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: Seems a good thermometer so far...
customer_reviews.text: We've only had a couple of illnesses to put this to the test since purchase but it seems accurate and is very fast. So far we are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: My HubbysWife

customer_reviews.title: Quick read
customer_reviews.text: The first time it arrived damaged but may have been due to it being delivered in an envelope rather than a box. Thermometer is quick to read and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Noland

customer_reviews.title: Great design somewhat imprecise readings
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall design, but the impreciseness of the readings tends to make me question the actual readouts. Sometimes readings vary by 1 degree. Readings are fast and the thermometer is easy to use especially in forehead scan mode.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Mai Shu

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use for both fore head & ear readings!
customer_reviews.text: This little thermometer is great. It’s very easy to use to grab a quick temp. I was pleasantly surprised to see this same thermometer at our primary care provider’s office last time I took my son in to her office.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonny K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for little kids
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this thermometer is to use and the kids don’t mind it. The colors are easy to understand and my son likes to make sure he’s is in the green and not red :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: working as expected
customer_reviews.text: working as expected. Used it once on head. Was easy to use and the temperature seemed accurate Giving 4 stars since i havent used ear feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shishir Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, almost fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is easy to use and accurate. It comes with everything you need, including a handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie BianchettaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great, accurate, and fast thermometer. We have tried several and this one is by far our favorite. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not only innovative, portable and very useful, AFFORDABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I have several Iproven products and I love them. Not only are they innovative, but very useful and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful technology!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the fact that I can easily sweep this across the forehead of a sleeping patient without disturbing them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Baskett

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and convenient. Takes a second on the forehead and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Careful with washing the tip
customer_reviews.text: Readings were off really high reading or really low ones. It won't calibrate and it reads in the 60s for temp..... Washed the tip and it went more screwy
customer_reviews.author: Truth be told

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Thai worked great for one day and now the readings are all over the place ranging from 96.1 to 101.2 in the same ear. I’ve tried it on myself as well as my kids and just not accurate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Skoglund

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer to have around the house for when it's needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a couple uses and injured my child!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this thermometer for 6 months and used it a few times when the kids were sick and it is already broken! It cut my sons ear as we didn’t realize that the plastic around the ear piece was broken. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 2-in1 thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and comes with a cute bag. Have tried other forehead thermometers and this one was the easiest
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Coffa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I have yet to get an accurate temperature reading. Usually shows normal temp at 96.5, which is completely off. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: kevin skatrud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is great to have on hand. The digital read out takes away ay guesswork in knowing if someone is running a fever.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Severino

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick results
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quickness and easiness use of this product especially when dealing with a sick infant.
customer_reviews.author: CozeeClown

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermometer and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer makes reading easy and simple and adds additional ease with a light up display in red, yellow, or green alerts.
customer_reviews.author: jason maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great for wiggly kids
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is essentially two in one. Battery back was a bit difficult to get back on, but otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: graciegirl

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: this thermometer DOES NOT work!!!!! apparently my baby and myself have a temperature of 97°.. i will never read higher.. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tammera c

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to you and ready to go. I wonder what was I thinking for not finding this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Luque

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thermometer I have ever purchased. Easy to use, quick readings.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: Broke second time using it. Reading my son’s temperature as below 97F. He actually has a fever of 102!
customer_reviews.author: ECop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is simple to understand, and gives you the opportunity to check the temperatures through two different parts of the body, making it convenient for everyone in the family to utilize.
customer_reviews.author: Ale Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy way to take a temperature. Love the in-ear feature to double check a temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer to use on children and provides accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: kmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Great price for product. Easy to switch from head to ear reading by removing cap/box off of top.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new one and I love that it has 2 ways to read- head and ear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great, seems very accurate and is very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Toph

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So fun to check temp at anytime
customer_reviews.author: Currie

customer_reviews.title: Speed vs accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The speed of the temperature reading is awesome, but I think the speed may make it less accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Witte

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer stopped working a couple of weeks in , even with a battery change . 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is very easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer for home use with kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: The ear probe is under the cap and just under the cap and very easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use, especially the colored digital reading. Lets you know if temp is high fast!. I use this as a home care tool and is the best I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: TRicher

customer_reviews.title: Highly Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Horrible inaccurate with both the in ear and forehead readings. When you have a sick child to get one reading that is over 100 (in the red) and one that is 99 (in the green) within a few seconds of each other is a major problem. Don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Literally a life-saver
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for us and then one for my grandma. This is the first digital thermometer that I have owned, but I really love that you can use it on the forehead or in the ear canal. I also love that the backlight changes colors based on temperature. You can't see that in the photo, but it was nice surprise. Haven't had any issues with it and couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY FAST & ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight learning curve because this thermometer is like nothing I've ever used before. But, the easy-to-follow instruction video is found on their website. Seriously, it takes seconds to get an accurate reading. This is the best thermometer I've ever seen or used. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Marakas

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I understand that there are adjustments to be made for head vs ear measurements. This instrument is wildly inconsistent. At times three degrees or more of a didfence from head to ear temps. Not appropriate during times of illness. Seems to measure air temperature well. I also found some humor in checking body temps with this instrument. I could measure my child, then myself and then check it using digital oral thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Hot garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll save you some heartache. Glue $30 worth of popsicle sticks together and write 97.1 on it with a permanent marker. Whenever your kid gets sick, just rub that across your kid’s forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Napun_Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Questionable readings
customer_reviews.text: The readings are all,over the place , not sure if it is a keeper. Seems like in a house at least one of us would be under 100 degrees, seeing only one of us has a cold. I thought I was paying more for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carmin DeRose

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love just swipping my son's forehead to get his temperature. I took it with an ear one as well. This one is so much easier to use and faster results and really accurate. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the ease of using this, especially because I don’t have to put it in my child mouth or armpit to get an accurate reading. I really love the carrying case it comes with and the batteries so you can use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and don't know how I've lived without it. Checking my temparture is so easy now, just a swipe of my forehead and I have the results. I no longer have to stick the old thermometers under my tongue and wait. I find this product to be very accurate and so easy to use. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Morello

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate
customer_reviews.text: Tested several times and had the exact same reading each time. Tested another person who had a slightly lower temperature. Seems accurate based on what I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but correct use is important or else you get false readings. Comes with a nice protective cloth case and small in size.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this is so accurate and easy to use...makes it easy to use on kids..grandkids...and adults..3 seconds and done..love it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate forehead readings
customer_reviews.text: Wildly inaccurate forehead readings. Can't be trusted in a health care field
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Silvestro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast working
customer_reviews.text: I love the pouch that the thermometer came with to store it in. It works very quickly which is super important when I'm trying to take my daughter's temperature at night.
customer_reviews.author: KMorin5

customer_reviews.title: Great for EMT use!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this as an EMT. I love it and find it a lot safer than an oral thermometer where I have to use a cover and possibly interact with saliva.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepsjunction

customer_reviews.title: Easy sleek design!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and simple sleek design. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesviolet

customer_reviews.title: What a great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use!!! I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

product_meta.title: iProven Digital Thermometer for Fever - Temperature Measurements via Forehead and Ear - Pouch, Batteries, and Quick Start Guide Included - Temporal Thermometer DMT-316
feature_bullets: ADULT THERMOMETER FOR EAR AND FOREHEAD - This thermometer is the ideal solution if you’re looking for an ear and tympanic thermometer for adults or seniors.

INTUITIVE DESIGN, CLEAR DISPLAY, AND LARGE OPERATING BUTTONS - To make sure this thermometer is easy to use, it’s equipped with a clear, backlit display and large operating buttons. The color indicator immediately lets you know whether a fever is at play. Temperature measurements made easy!
CLINICALLY TESTED FOR OPTIMAL ACCURACY - Our thermometers are extensively clinically tested. Everything to make sure you get accurate and consistent readings in 1-3 seconds only.
PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL QUALITY FOR HOME-USE - Professional quality, delivered right at your doorstep. That’s the quality you’ve come to expect from iProven.
OUR 100-100 POLICY - ORDER TODAY, you’re protected by a 100 day, no-questions asked money back guarantee and world class customer service **.
